title: Workplace Informal Learning Strategy Development: Simulation-Based Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Science domain job-applied education conducted in a BYOD environment. Strengthening practical competencies through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three job-related problem-solving methods through informal interactions with peers and supervisors in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can analyze science-related work issues with 80% accuracy using online information searches and peer feedback.
Learners can incorporate five personal/organizational factors that motivate learning within an organization into a project report.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
